body.name: BONTEC No-Stud TV Wall Mount for 26-55 inch LED LCD OLED Plasma Flat/Curved TVs, with Max VESA 400x400mm, No Damage Drywall Studless TV Wall Mount, Bubble Level and Cable Ties Included
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 57 mins
features: 【Studless TV Wall Mount】This no-stud TV wall mount does not require wall studs for installation, which avoid the hassle of locating wall studs for fixture. It fits most 26 to 55 inch TVs, with a maximum weight capacity of 121lbs on wood or brick walls and 88lbs on drywalls.

【Space-Saving】Measures only 1.1inch from the wall, its low-profile, space-saving design makes the wall mount almost invisible after installation. The bottom of the screen can be rested against the wall for glare-killing tilt, and it comes with extra plastic washers to flush mount your TV with the wall. It also gives extra room for cables to prevent wall scratches.
【Solid Steel Construction】Made of heavy-duty steel with high strength, this mount can hold up to 121lbs, ensuring the safety of your appliance. Cable ties are included.

【Universal TV Wall mount】Fits 26-55 inch screen with VESA patterns from 100x100 to 400x400mm (the VESA pattern is the distance between the four mounting holes on the back of your TV.) It is compatible with the majority of TV models on the market,like Insignia,TCL,SAMSUNG,Toshiba,LG,Hisense,VIZIO,Pioneer,Sceptre,Philips,Sony,Panasonic,Sharp,Element and so on. Note: the thickness of the drywall should be greater than 10mm (0.4”.)

【Quick Installation】No drill needed, installation only involves the need to hammer 21 tiny steel nails in the wall; Bubble level and all mounting hardware included.Easy installation in 10 minutes. (Note: This TV wall mount is recommended to be installed on drywall or wood wall.)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The BONTEC team has been dedicated to offering the perfect solution for TV sets. Every TV mount or stand, designed to make your device safe and flexible for a better viewing experience. Designed especially for drywall, this BONTEC TV mount is super easy to install with no need for finding a stud.

VESA, and Size Compatibility This No-Stud drywall compatible TV Wall mount for most 26"-55" flat, curved TVs with VESA mounting holes spacing up to 400x400mm. (Note: Only two upper VESA holes will be used for this TV mount.)
Maximum Load Capacity This No-Stud TV wall mount can be used for 88lbs on drywalls and 121lbs on wood or brick walls.

Previous page This low-profile TV wall mount sits only 1.1inch from the wall, which saves space. Easy to mount your TV to drywall. No need to drill or find wall studs. This 26-55 inch TV wall mount allows tilt adjustment for a comfortable viewing experience. Next page 1 Neat & Space-saving 2 10 MIN FAST INSTALLATION 3 Comfortable Viewing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars JUST GET IT
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to put a TV on the wall with no studs whatsoever. I purchased this mount and installed in under 5minutes...yes I said 5 minutes. Many months later and the TV is still hanging strong. Just follow the directions and see for yourself. I'm amazed and totally happy with this mount. I didn't even need 1 stud to install. Get your hammer and use the level that comes in the kit and see for yourself how easy and quickly this installs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean and simple
reviews.reviewText: This wall mount is easier to hang than a picture. Once on yhe wall it is very solid. I will buy this again for tv's in other rooms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this No Stud TV Wall Mount to use on my floor model TV stand. I have a new TV and a stand to which I didn’t have the bracket for the back of my TV and therefore I needed an easy fix. This no stud tv wall mount worked perfectly for me. It’s very sturdy, well built and priced economically friendly I highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lots of holes
reviews.reviewText: Simple enough to install, but makes a lot of holes that I’ll have to spot when I remove it. However, I knew that going in. A little tricky to level because when the second nail goes in it tends to pull down. Does what I needed it to do for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for need
reviews.reviewText: This was to mount a 32" TV in a space that didn't have an available wall stud. Worked great. Instructions were easy to understand and only required a hammer and screw driver. Didn't use the level that was included as I had a larger one so can't speak to its helpfulness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So far it's still up.lol I'm just not convinced yet.The nails ti get hammered into the wall at an angle and that does offer more support.I hammered in all 21 nails.lol I mean,why wouldn't you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They hype is real. This thing works.
reviews.reviewText: By far the easiest mount I've ever hung and works perfectly. Not having to deal with stud finders and the fact that wall studs are never aligned where you need them makes this a perfect solution. For reference, I used this on a Samsung 43" LED TV.
I was looking to have my TV on the wall without worrying about if there were no studs. Good product, met my expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was easy to install and very sturdy. our TV on the wall looks very safe.
Beim installieren am Tv unbedingt auf die länge der Schrauben achten.

reviews.reviewTitle: ottimo supporto sottile ma non troppo
reviews.reviewText: Ho cercato di acquistare una staffa tv che fosse sottile ma non eccessivamente costosa.ho deciso per questo prodotto sopratutto per il prezzo.CONTENUTO: ci sono viti m8 e m5 da 50 e 20mm, una piccola livella a bolla, più una serie di spessori, rondelle e chiodi (!) per fissarlo al muro. Non ci sono tasselli perchè non previsti.INSTALLAZIONE: a differenza di quanto mostrato nelle istruzioni, ho preferito fissarla al muro con 3 fisher da 6mm. Le viti passa giuste giuste nei fori presenti sulla staffa.L'installazione della parte di staffa che si attacca alla tv è stata immediata.ASSEMBLAGGIO: una volta montati i due pezzi (uno a muro e uno sulla TV) attaccare la tv alla staffa è relativamente semplice...dipende dalle dimensioni della tv.generalmente mi ritengo soddisfatto, avrei preferito qualche cm in meno tra il muro e la tv ma per queste cifre non posso lamentarmi.
